questions.question_text_1: Which of the following is/are CORRECT about heap?  Choose the correct option(s).
question_texts: Which of the following is/are CORRECT about heap?  Choose the correct option(s).

options.option_text: Heap is used to store dynamically allocated data.
Activation records created for functions are allocated in heap.
Heap storage needs to be explicitly requested by the programmer.
A heap storage allocation cannot be deallocated in any way.
